member.name: T:Waf.InformationManager.Common.Presentation.Controls.SearchBox
member.summary: Represents a control that can be used to enter a search or filter text.

member.name: P:Waf.InformationManager.Common.Presentation.Controls.SearchBox.SearchText
member.summary: Gets or sets the search text.

member.name: P:Waf.InformationManager.Common.Presentation.Controls.SearchBox.HintText
member.summary: Gets or sets the hint text. This text is shown in the background if no search text is entered.
